document.full_text: israel killed four palestinian militants and wounded half a dozen others as it pursued air raids in gaza for a third day on saturday, responding to increased rocket fire out of the territory, local medics said.
document.title: gaza-israel violence rages on as 4 militants killed
lines_and_colors: israel killed four palestinian militants and wounded half a dozen others as it pursued air raids in gaza for a third day on saturday, responding to increased rocket fire out of the territory, local medics said.
